item.description: My thinking is that we start this ride by going 3A to the bridge.............we usually go the highway but 3A is such a beautiful ride all the way to the bridge. Any thoughts on that idea? Anywhere to go after the bridge that may be interesting is a mystery!!!!! Lunch????? Any volunteers to lead????.....Sue seems to want to stay home and paint rather than ride. This may well be our last ride....who knows. But it is certainly unusual to have a 60 degree weekend in November so let's take advantage of it! Meet :  Dunkin Donuts in Pembroke Time:  10 am ..... Kickstands up at 1030 am See you there!

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Mystery ride
